description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. This game is a horizontal scroll shooting game.  The character of two people can be switched.  It raises the level when EXP is collected, and power improves.  The trial version is 4 stages.  The product version is 12 stages.
description.short: This game is a horizontal scroll shooting game.  The character of two people can be switched.  It raises the level when EXP is collected, and power improves.  The trial version is 4 stages.  The product version is 12 stages.
